title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Scott exposes Mitchell and Anita to Cleo?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Scott Drinkwell’s (Ross Adams) relationship with Mitchell Deveruax (Imran Adams) in Hollyoaks has been a complicated one to say the least, as the latter has struggled to come to terms with his developing feelings for the former, but things are set to escalate in the coming episodes, as Scott deliberates over whether or not he should reveal the truth to everyone — including an unsuspecting Cleo (Nadine Mulkerrin).

With tensions running high in upcoming instalments, Scott decides to destroy his Anita wig. However, Diane (Alex Fletcher) spots him doing so and attempts to put a stop to it. Unable to carry on with things as they are, Scott reveals to Diane that he’s planning on quitting drag forever, but — unable to accept such a statement without an explanation — Diane asks him to tell her the reason why he came to this decision.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Although it takes some convincing, Cleo manages to get Scott to agree to perform as Anita for one final time — something which will take place at Mercedes’ (Jennifer Metcalfe) birthday party at The Dog. However, upon making this decision, Scott decides that he’ll not be taking any prisoners during the performance.

As Mercedes’ bash arrives, Anita takes to the stage, and it’s clear that she means business — something which leaves Mitchell incredibly worried.

Will Anita reveal all?

Cleo would be heartbroken if she were to learn the truth, but given that actress Nadine will be going on maternity leave soon, such a revelation could prove instrumental in the character’s departure.

One to watch: Friday 11th October at 7pm on E4.
